description: Welcome to Terramor by Polygonâ€“a highly sought-after North Burnaby community where comfort meets resort-style living. This spacious 3-beds, 2.5-bath, 3-level townhome has bright open-concept layout w/ large windows & tandem garage ideal for storage or home gym. All 3 bedrooms located upstairs, while the powder room is on main floor. Designed for modern family living, home offers the perfect blend of space, functionality& style. Enjoy resort-inspired amenities like outdoor pool, hot tub, sauna, yoga room, gym, clubhouse, indoor mini golf& playground everything your family needs just steps from home! Minutes from Hwy 1,Lougheed Hwy, Lougheed Town Centre, Costco,& SFU & within Cameron Elementary & Burnaby Mountain Secondary school catchments, this home truly offers best of family & lifestyle!
